sentences.sContent: But why cover your car in sod?
sentences.sContent_eng: But why cover your car in sod?
sentences.sCn: 不过为什么要盖上一层草皮呢？

sentences.sContent: To thy high requiem become a sod.
sentences.sContent_eng: To thy high requiem become a sod.
sentences.sCn: 如一块草皮对你的安魂曲。

sentences.sContent: With a good shovel, you can cut an outline of the garden in the grass. Your child can then pull the sod away and set it aside it for composting.
sentences.sContent_eng: With a good shovel, you can cut an outline of the garden in the grass. Your child can then pull the sod away and set it aside it for composting.
sentences.sCn: 先用铲子在草地上划出一个菜园的轮廓，教孩子们把草皮推到一边作堆肥——这是一个让他们了解自然界物质循环利用的好机会。

words.tran: （用以加强语气）见鬼的；他妈的
草皮的；被草皮遮覆著的
以草泥堆砌筑成的房屋

trans.tranOther: a piece of earth or the layer of earth with grass and roots growing in it
